message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement, the "Net Profit" line item represents exactly what I'm looking for. This is the profit that remains after deducting all operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization from the total revenue.

In the provided cash flow statement dated 2024-02-05, the Net Profit is reported as 963263.19.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '963263.19'}}
```
